name: The horror of secret experiments
description:
The horror of secret experiments is a creepy and frightening first-person horror game. You are waiting for the study of a large scientific complex, in which an experiment took place, which led to participation in the anomalous zone. The scientific complex itself is a set of tunnels and rooms that must be passed during the main goal - to get out of the laboratory and collect information about the experiments. Some of the doors are locked, so you need to look for a door key in an unknown part of the science complex.Will you be able to get out of the lab and still take important information with you? The choice is up to you. You are waiting for the study of a large underground location. Frightening enemies - in the form of anomalies.
Game features.
- Creepy atmosphere;
- Sounds and soundtrack perfectly immersive in the game;
- Two alternate endings depending on the player's actions.
